Key Match Events: Kawhi Leonard made his NBA season debut against the Atlanta Hawks, tallying 12 points in 19 minutes.
Pre-Game Insights: Ty Lue told reporters that Kawhi Leonard's return will be treated like the preseason as he ramps up after his long absence.
Post-Match Reflections: Kawhi Leonard spoke about returning to a Clippers team that has been playing well in his absence, praising players like James, Zu, and Norm.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Clippers snapped a two-game losing streak in Leonard's return, improving to 20-15 on the season.
Others: Kawhi Leonard made a statement that went viral, saying 'It felt great. Was able to throw some paint on the canvas tonight. We're working to create something beautiful so let's keep going.'
